tasks.task: Plant trees and shrubs in the backyard

Acquire the trees and shrubs
Prepare the soil for planting
Dig holes for the trees and shrubs
Plant the trees and shrubs

Monitor the growth and health of the plants

Plan the layout and size of the water feature
Obtain necessary permits or approvals (if required)

Design the garden layout
Prepare the garden area with improved soil
Plant the selected native plants
Water the newly planted garden
Maintain the garden and remove weeds

Introduce beneficial insects like ladybugs and praying mantises

Invite friends and family to enjoy the backyard
